name: Space LLC
description:
-Idle incremental clicker in space!

-Multiplayer, play with friends to complete weekly goals!

-Realistic graphics!

-Hatch eggs to find rare pets, unstable power cores, and more!

-16 pets to collect each with it own unique bonus! Stack bonuses to make space bucks faster!

-18 unique mining colony upgrades, 10 unique freighters, and 17 mineral levels!

-Skill tree allows you to customize your play. Select active or passive bonuses! 4 trees to choose from!

-Battle UFOs, and shot down comets for each cash!

-Free cloud backups using your iOS key-chain. Keep your game safe even if you upgrade your phone!
